description: This Java source file defines the UserService class, which contains business logic related to user management and user notification preferences within a Spring application.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: Provides business logic for user operations, including sign-up, profile updates, and notification preferences management.

methods.name: signupOrGet
methods.description: Registers a new user if the email does not exist, or retrieves existing user; also initializes notification preferences.

methods.name: updatePreferences
methods.description: Updates notification preferences for a user, including email notifications, webhook settings, and webhook URL.
